title.description: Display text for the navigation item

url.description: Link URL (can be page slug like 'PublicAbout' or external URL like 'https://example.com')

link_type.description: Whether the link is to an internal page or external URL

location.description: Which navigation bar this item appears in

parent_id.description: Parent navigation item ID for sub-menus (null for top-level items)

display_order.description: Order in which this item appears

is_active.description: Whether this item is currently visible

open_in_new_tab.description: For external links, whether to open in a new tab
